title: TPG Prices IPO at $29.50 a Share
sub_head: Private-equity firm will start trading Thursday under the ticker TPG
body:
Private-equity firm TPG Inc. priced its initial public offering at $29.50 a share, people familiar with the matter said, in the first big test of the IPO market in the new year.
The pricing is at the midpoint of TPGâ€™s projected range for the offering of $28 to $31 apiece. The stock will start trading Thursday on the Nasdaq Stock Market under the ticker TPG.
